thread.title: Iron Mountain Incorporated to Host 2015 Investor Day
thread.title_full: Iron Mountain Incorporated to Host 2015 Investor Day

title: Iron Mountain Incorporated to Host 2015 Investor Day
text:
Tip : Use comma (,) to separate multiple quotes. Learn more... 
Wed, Sep 23, 2015, 13:53 BST - UK Markets close in 2 hrs 37 mins Iron Mountain Incorporated to Host 2015 Investor Day Topics to Include Strategic Plan and Financial Outlook Press Release : Iron Mountain – 23 minutes ago -0.38 
BOSTON--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- 
Iron Mountain Incorporated ( IRM ), the storage and information services company, is hosting an Investor Day on Wednesday, October 14 th , 2015 in New York City. This gathering of company management, investors and securities analysts will feature management presentations related to the company’s strategic plan and financial outlook by William L. Meaney, president and chief executive officer, and members of the senior executive team. 
The event will be held at the Mandarin Oriental Hotel, 80 Columbus Circle, New York, New York. Registration and continental breakfast begin at 8:00 a.m. with executive presentations commencing at 8:30 a.m. A buffet lunch will be available following the session. 
Registration details for the event are available on the Investor Relations section of www.ironmountain.com , under “Events and Presentations.” To register to attend the event, click HERE . A live webcast and replay of the presentation will be posted to the same section of the Website. 
About Iron Mountain Iron Mountain Incorporated ( IRM ) is a leading provider of storage and information management services. The company’s real estate network of more than 67 million square feet across more than 1,000 facilities in 36 countries allows it to serve customers around the world. And its solutions for records management , data management , document management , and secure shredding help organizations to lower storage costs, comply with regulations, recover from disaster, and better use their information. Founded in 1951, Iron Mountain stores and protects billions of information assets, including business documents, backup tapes, electronic files and medical data. Visit www.ironmountain.com for more information. View source version on businesswire.com: http://www.businesswire.com/news/home/20150923005309/en/ Contact:
